Title: The Belly of an Architect
Actors: Brian Dennehy, Chloe Webb, Lambert Wilson, Sergio Fantoni
Plot: An American architect arrives in Italy, supervising an exhibition for a French architect, Boullée, who is famous for his oval structures. Through the course of 9 months he becomes obsessed with his belly, suffers severe stomach pains, loses his wife, exhibition, his unborn child and finally his own life.
